name: Pam the Inspirer
description:
Use your keyboard or mouse to explore the world. Interact with characters by pressing action buttons. There are many characters who need to be inspired! Can you help them all?

Pam the Inspirer was created by 11 middle-school students at PAMCUT in Portland, Oregon over the duration of one week! The sound effects, music, landscape, houses, characters, animations, special effects, title screens and gameplay were all from the hands and hearts of these young talented game developers!
